page.shortlink: api objects security object change password question and answer method
page.description: Changes the security question and security answer for the user.
page.syntax: Context.Security.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer as L (UserName as C, Password as C, Question as C, Answer as C)

argument.name: UserName
argument.description: The name of the user as is used during login.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the user's question and answer was changed; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.ChangePasswordQuestionAndAnswer() changes the security question and security answer for the user. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
